name: Run, Jump & shoot
description:
this is a game I'm currently working on and probably will be for the foreseeable future. there's no artwork as of current and only one boss whilst lacking a tutorial among other important videogame things however I thought id release this short beta for people to play if they wanted to. feel free to leave feedback if you wish. however in the future updates to this game can only be bug fixes, artwork and music due to how I'm limited by the free version of construct 3. I'm also working on a mobile game or two to try and solve this issue but until then I'm limited in my abilities to do more content

the quit button doesnt work properly but eh.
